entry.name: switchTabsOnHover
entry.label: Whether to switch between menu tabs by hovering them.

entry.name: switchCategoriesOnHover
entry.label: Whether to switch between categories by hovering them.

entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon used in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: favorites
entry.label: List of general favorites. Supported values are menu id's (usually .desktop file names), special URLs that expand into default applications (e.g. preferred://browser), document URLs and KPeople contact URIs.

entry.name: primaryActions
entry.label: Which actions should be displayed in the footer: 0 = Power, 1 = Session, 2 = Custom

entry.name: configureButtonAction
entry.label: What to do on scrolling-down launcher button.

entry.name: scrollingDown
entry.label: What to do on scrolling-down launcher button.

entry.name: favoritesPortedToKAstats
entry.label: Are the favorites ported to use KActivitiesStats to allow per-activity favorites

entry.name: systemApplications
entry.label: List of applications at the top of the "Computer" tab.

entry.name: favoritesDisplay
entry.label: How to display favorites: 0 = Grid, 1 = List

entry.name: gridAllowTwoLines
entry.label: Whether to allow showing two lines in grid view.

entry.name: alphaSort
entry.label: Whether to sort menu contents alphabetically or use manual/system sort order.
